Class DataElementText

public class DataElementText

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataElementText

        public DataElementText()
        Default constructor of text item

      • DataElementText

        public DataElementText(java.util.Date creationDate,
               java.lang.String name,
               boolean included,
               int position,
               DataElement.DisplayType displayType,
               UserStory userStory,
               java.lang.String text)
        Constructor of User specifying the name, login and password
        Parameters:
        creationDate: - the date when the text item was created
        name: - the name of the text item
        included: - whether the text item is included or not in the publication of its parent User Story.
        position: - the position of the text item in the user story it belongs to
        displayType: - the way the data element should be displayed
        userStory: - the user story to which this text item belongs
        content: - the text of the text item
